column5: OPK This must be what the mindset of an OPK bull is like Four year downtrend Not a problem 90 off the alltime high Doesnt matter Stock hitting 10 year lows Not to worry All of their products falling significantly below projections Be patient CEO is a fraud Who cares Dont like what the Bears have to say Block them or curse them Hear what you want to hear see what you want to see because everybody else is wrong but you You have it right and the rest of the intelligent world is wrong Defend your position and your beliefs all the way down to zero Because YOU know what youre doing
